channel.title: A Truly Intergalactic Journey - Etchris (Album idea, Collab?)
channel.description: Hi all, I am wanting to create an album for the start of 2020. However, I haven't created a song in a while, other than the two I've posted. I was wondering if anyone wanted to collaborate on a song for the album with me? . . . Although I should name the album after I create the songs, I've been really digging space, and how space may be portrayed as planets. And so the name I was feeling was "A Truly Intergalactic Journey" . . . Thanks, Ethan Christensen (etchris)

item.title: A Truly Intergalactic Journey - Etchris (Album idea, Collab?)
item.dc:creator: Etchris
item.description:
here are some updated ideas…
One of them isn’t really space but something that came across my mind…

non-space themed but maybe if there was an alien beach party:

item.title: A Truly Intergalactic Journey - Etchris (Album idea, Collab?)
item.dc:creator: Etchris
item.description:
Hi all,
I am wanting to create an album for the start of 2020. However, I haven’t created a song in a while, other than the two I’ve posted. I was wondering if anyone wanted to collaborate on a song for the album with me?
.
.
.
Although I should name the album after I create the songs, I’ve been really digging space, and how space may be portrayed as planets. And so the name I was feeling was “A Truly Intergalactic Journey”
.
.
.
Thanks,
Ethan Christensen (etchris)

Read full topic
